job_purpose: Support the delivery of Data and Analytical Capability and Business Intelligence through developing and maintaining data products, project solution design, content creation, and other bespoke solutions.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Lead the full lifecycle of product development
Identify operational needs and gather business requirements
Conduct proof of concepts, scope, prioritization, design, implementation, user acceptance testing, quality assurance, deployment, maintenance, and support
Prioritize value-added features based on customer or product owner feedback
required_qualifications: Experience in developing and maintaining data products
Experience in user acceptance testing and quality assurance
Prior experience in leading product development lifecycle
preferred_qualifications: Certifications in relevant data analytics or business intelligence tools
Experience in working with diverse teams
company_details: WA Health is committed to diversity, eliminating discrimination, and supporting flexible working practices. They are dedicated to growing the Aboriginal workforce as part of their Aboriginal Workforce Policy.
